definitions.definition: a large building where people who are ill or injured are given medical treatment and care
definitions.sensetop: to/into (the) hospitalin (the) hospitalin a hospitalout of (the) hospitalat a hospital
definitions.labels: (British English)(North American English)British EnglishNorth American English

He had to **go to/into the hospital** for treatment.

a **psychiatric/maternity hospital**

**hospital staff**

wordOrigin: Middle English (originally meaning a hospice run by the Knights Hospitallers in the 11th century): via Old French from medieval Latin hospitale, neuter of Latin hospitalis ‘hospitable’, from hospes, hospit- ‘host, guest’.
